Clare Lyle

Mathematical Musings

Hello, world!

My name's Clare Lyle. I've just finished my second year studying math and computer science at McGill University. I like to write about math, computer science, and life in general. I've mostly written about science and tech at the McGill Tribune, but I'm starting to write more mathematically-themed material for this website.
